GenAiPlugin.description: Interacts with the Customer to notify about the Customer still holding a recalled Product when the Customer greets the Agent with a "Hi" or "Hello".

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If customer says 'Hi' or 'Hello' then show recall product by running 'GetRecallContactFromSegment' action by passing Contact context variable as contactId to input and return the response message If there are no recall product then say 'Hi, how can I assist you today?' DO NOT ADD ANYTHING EXTRA

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is the inform the logged-in Customer about the recalled Product that the Customer is yet to return, when the Customer greets with a "Hi" or "Hello".
